QuestData.Title: Kaja'Cola Gives You IDEAS! (TM)
QuestData.Description: Assistant Greely is clearly bewildered and intimidated. How will she help you to find a way to rescue everyone in this condition?$B$BMaybe if she were to drink one of those Kaja'Cola Zero-One drinks you saw, she'd be able to have a bright idea?
QuestData.RewardText: <Assistant Greely spots the Kaja'Cola Zero-One in your hand and her eyes seem to come to life.>
